Name: The Fool
Description: The card of new beginnings, innocent trust, and the courage to step into the unknown.

Name: The Magician
Description: The card of personal power, manifestation mastery, and turning ideas into reality.

Name: The High Priestess
Description: The card of intuitive wisdom, hidden knowledge, and the mysteries that lie beyond surface understanding.

Name: The Empress
Description: The card of fertility, abundance, and the creative power of the divine feminine.

Name: The Emperor
Description: The card of leadership, authority, and the power to create stability through structure and discipline.

Name: The Heirophant
Description: The card of spiritual wisdom, traditional teachings, and sacred knowledge.

Name: The Lovers
Description: The card of divine love, meaningful choices, and authentic connection.

Name: The Chariot
Reversed: Lack of direction, Losing control, Scattered energy
Description: The card of victory, determination, and controlled forward movement.

Name: Strength
Reversed: Self-doubt, Lack of confidence, Harsh force
Description: The card of inner courage, gentle power, and compassion over force.

Name: The Hermit
Description: The card of sacred solitude, truth, and guidance from within.

Name: Wheel of Fortune
Reversed: Bad luck, Lack of control, Resistance
Description: The card of destiny, cycles, and life's turning points.

Name: Justice
Description: The card of truth, fairness, and karmic balance.

Name: The Hanged Man
Description: True clarity comes not from action, but from surrender, stillness, and seeing life from a new perspective.

Name: Death
Description: The card of transformation, endings, and rebirth.

Name: Temperance
Description: The card of balance, healing moderation, and the wisdom that comes from integrating opposing forces into harmonious unity.

Name: The Devil
Reversed: Breaking free, Releasing addictions, Spiritual liberation
Description: The card of shadow work and breaking free from self-imposed chains.

Name: The Tower
Description: The card of sudden awakening, necessary destruction, and the liberation that comes when false structures collapse to make space for authentic truth.

Name: The Star
Upright: Sacred alignment, Emotional renewal, Divine support
Reversed: Disconnection, Loss of direction, Blocked inspiration
Description: The card of hope returned, soul healing, and trust in what still calls you forward.

Name: The Moon
Description: The card of instinct, illusion, and the quiet intelligence of the unconscious.

Name: The Sun
Reversed: Setbacks, Delayed joy, Inner child woundings
Description: The card of pure joy, radiant success, childlike wonder, and enlightened consciousness.

Name: Judgement
Description: The card of spiritual awakening and answering your true calling.

Name: The World
Reversed: Incomplete, Lack of closure, Seeking validation
Description: The card of wholeness, completion, and the integration of all you’ve become.

Name: Ace of Cups
Description: The card of emotional beginnings, overflowing love, and divine inspiration.

Name: Two of Cups
Description: The card of partnership, mutual attraction, and emotional harmony.

Name: Three of Cups
Description: The card of celebration, friendship, and joyful community.

Name: Four of Cups
Description: The card of emotional withdrawal, contemplation, and overlooked opportunities.

Name: Five of Cups
Description: The card of loss, grief, and the difficult journey toward acceptance.

Name: Six of Cups
Description: The card of nostalgia, innocent joy, and meaningful connections to the past.

Name: Seven of Cups
Description: The card of illusion, distraction, and high risk choices.

Name: Eight of Cups
Description: The card of walking away, spiritual pilgrimage, and the courage to seek something deeper.

Name: Nine of Cups
Description: The card of deep contentment, quiet confidence, and fulfillment without performance.

Name: Ten of Cups
Description: The card of shared joy, emotional legacy, and love that roots itself in connection.

Name: Page of Cups
Description: The card of emotional openness, intuitive curiosity, and tender beginnings.

Name: Knight of Cups
Description: The card of passionate action, bold adventures, dynamic energy, and fearless pursuit.

Name: Queen of Cups
Description: The card of emotional clarity, deep listening, and intuitive presence.

Name: King of Cups
Description: The card of emotional maturity, quiet strength, and devotion without control.

Name: Ace of Wands
Reversed: Delays, Creative blocks, Lack of direction
Description: The card of creative spark, passionate inspiration, and the raw energy that transforms possibility into the first steps of manifestation.

Name: Two of Wands
Description: The card of planning, vision, and the power to choose your direction with confidence and foresight.

Name: Three of Wands
Description: The card of vision, expansion, and momentum grounded in preparation.

Name: Four of Wands
Description: The card of rooted joy, shared milestones, and stability made visible.

Name: Five of Wands
Description: The card of creative conflict, healthy competition, and the dynamic tension that spurs growth and innovation.

Name: Six of Wands
Description: The card of victory, achievement, public recognition, and celebration.

Name: Seven of Wands
Reversed: Giving up, Defeat, Lack of self belief
Description: The card of inner conviction, resilience under pressure, and defending your position with clarity.

Name: Eight of Wands
Description: The card of acceleration and swift movement toward your goals.

Name: Nine of Wands
Description: The card of resilience, persistence, final tests, and protective strength.

Name: Ten of Wands
Description: The card of burdened momentum, overloaded will, and the weight of accumulated responsibility.

Name: Page of Wands
Description: The card of limitless potential.

Name: Knight of Wands
Upright: Bold adventure, Fiery energy, Passionate action
Description: The card of passionate action, bold adventures, dynamic energy, and fearless pursuit.

Name: Queen of Wands
Description: The card of bold magnetism, grounded passion, and instinctual confidence.

Name: King of Wands
Description: The card of visionary leadership, entrepreneurial mastery, creative authority, and inspiring confidence.

Name: Ace of Swords
Description: The card of new ideas, possibilities, and truth.

Name: Two of Swords
Description: The card of difficult decisions, mental balance, inner conflict, and temporary stalemate.

Name: Three of Swords
Description: The card of heartbreak, painful truth, grief, and necessary endings.

Name: Four of Swords
Description: The card of emotional authority, quiet stability, and care without collapse.

Name: Five of Swords
Description: The card of inner courage, gentle power, and compassion over force.

Name: Six of Swords
Description: The card of transition, healing, moving forward, and seeking calmer waters.

Name: Seven of Swords
Description: The card of strategy, concealment, discernment, and self-protection.

Name: Eight of Swords
Description: The card of mental restriction, self-imposed limitations, feeling trapped, and the journey to liberation.

Name: Nine of Swords
Description: The card of sleepless nights and worry.

Name: Ten of Swords
Description: The card of painful endings, betrayal, rock bottom, and dawn after darkness.

Name: Page of Swords
Upright: Curious exploration, New learning, Mental agility
Description: The card of curiosity, sharp awareness, and the first steps into mental clarity.

Name: Knight of Swords
Upright: Swift action, Intellectual pursuit, Bold communication
Description: The card of swift momentum, focused intellect, and unshakable determination.

Name: Queen of Swords
Description: The card of discernment, honest speech, and clear perception

Name: King of Swords
Description: The card of mental clarity, structured authority, and integrity in action.

Name: Ace of Pentacles
Description: The card of new beginnings, material opportunity, prosperity potential, and grounded manifestation.

Name: Two of Pentacles
Description: The card of balance, adaptability, juggling priorities, and flexible resource management.

Name: Three of Pentacles
Description: The card of collaboration, skill-building, teamwork, and recognition.

Name: Four of Pentacles
Description: The card of control, guardedness, and the need to feel safe in what’s yours.

Name: Five of Pentacles
Description: The card of lack, isolation, resilience, and inner strength.

Name: Six of Pentacles
Description: The card of exchange, shared power, and generosity rooted in balance.

Name: Seven of Pentacles
Description: The card of patience, long-term effort, and trusting the process of slow growth.

Name: Eight of Pentacles
Description: The card of mastery, patience, and purposeful creation.

Name: Nine of Pentacles
Description: The card of earned independence, inner refinement, and self-defined wealth.

Name: Ten of Pentacles
Description: The card of lasting wealth, lineage, and rooted belonging.

Name: Page of Pentacles
Upright: Grounded focus, New skills, Practical goals
Description: The card of devotion, grounded focus, and the first step toward lasting growth.

Name: Knight of Pentacles
Description: The card of dedication and slow and steady hard work.

Name: Queen of Pentacles
Description: The card of practical abundance, nurturing prosperity, and earthy wisdom.

Name: King of Pentacles
Reversed: Greed, Manipulative leadership, Obsession with status
Description: The card of mastery, grounded leadership, and steady abundance.
